automationNetwork

Class ValerieNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • automationNetwork.ValerieNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Network

    public class ValerieNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
implements Network
    This is the default implementation of the Network interface. It supports commuincation with a network of ArduIMUs running Valerie's custom network layer by communicating with the root node over a serial port.
    Author:
    Paul

      • sendPacket

        public boolean sendPacket(int peripheralID,
                 java.lang.Object data)
        Description copied from interface: Network
        Send a packet to a particular peripheral in the network.
        Specified by:
        sendPacket in interface Network
        Parameters:
        peripheralID - the ID of the peripheral to send the message to
        data - the data to send
        Returns:
        true if successfully sent, false if not. Also return false if there is no peripheral with ID peripheralID.
